field.name: STPE
field.description: no description available

enumeratedValue.description: Disable TSI when MCU goes into low power modes
Allows TSI to continue running in all low power modes

field.name: STM
field.description: Scan Trigger Mode. This bit-field can only be changed if the TSI module is disabled (TSIEN bit = 0)

field.name: ESOR
field.description: End-of-Scan or Out-of-Range Interrupt select

field.name: ERIE
field.description: Error Interrupt Enable

field.name: TSIIE
field.description: Touch Sensing Input Interrupt Module Enable

field.name: TSIEN
field.description: Touch Sensing Input Module Enable

field.name: SWTS
field.description: Software Trigger Start

field.name: SCNIP
field.description: Scan In Progress status

field.name: OVRF
field.description: Overrun error Flag. This flag is set when a scan trigger occurs while a scan is still in progress. Writing "1" to this bit will clear the flag to 0

field.name: EXTERF
field.description: External Electrode error occurred

enumeratedValue.description: No fault happend on TSI electrodes
Short to VDD or VSS was detected on one or more electrodes

field.name: OUTRGF
field.description: Out of Range Flag

field.name: EOSF
field.description: End of Scan Flag

field.name: PS
field.description: Electrode Oscillator prescaler

field.name: NSCN
field.description: Number of Consecutive Scans per Electrode electrode

field.name: LPSCNITV
field.description: TSI Low Power Mode Scan Interval

field.name: LPCLKS
field.description: Low Power Mode Clock Source Selection

enumeratedValue.description: LPOCLK is selected to determine the scan period in low power mode
VLPOSCCLK is selected to determine the scan period in low power mode

field.name: AMPSC
field.description: Active Mode Prescaler

field.name: AMCLKS
field.description: Active Mode Clock Source

field.name: SMOD
field.description: Scan Module

field.name: EXTCHRG
field.description: External OSC Charge Current select

field.name: REFCHRG
field.description: Ref OSC Charge Current select

field.name: PEN0
field.description: Touch Sensing Input Pin Enable Register 0

The corresponding pin is used by TSI

field.name: LPSP
field.description: Low Power Scan Pin

enumeratedValue.description: TSI_IN[0] is active in low power mode
TSI_IN[1] is active in low power mode
TSI_IN[2] is active in low power mode
TSI_IN[3] is active in low power mode
TSI_IN[4] is active in low power mode

field.name: WUCNT
field.description: TouchSensing wake-up Channel 16bit counter value

field.description: TouchSensing Channel n-1 16-bit counter value
